oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Weatherhouse - 1947-11-08 - Part 2 // Peacock Rag
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of excerpts from a Weatherhouse sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment (10:15-10:30 pm) from November 8, 1947. Featuring David Cobb (host), and performers Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys, Jimmy Riddle, Pap's Jug Band, and Tommy Jackson. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. Followed by a fiddle tune of unknown origin.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tommy Jackson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Fire On The Mountain (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- David Cobb talks (incomplete) -- [break] -- Announcer introduces unidentified fiddler -- Peacock Rag ([Unidentified])
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; Riddle, Jimmy, 1918-1982; Wilson, Lonnie; Pap's Jug Band; Estes, Milton, 1914-1963; Jackson, Tommy; Cobb, David (Announcer);
